GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.10.132
GSD.description:
drm/panfrost: Fix shrinker list corruption by madvise IOCTL

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.132 by commit 0581613df7f9a4c5fac096ce1d5fb15b7b994240, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 013b6510131568ce4e01856d5360bfdfe9c3632f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/panfrost: Fix shrinker list corruption by madvise IOCTL
